decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2024 - 36 - 01 REV A: Existing Floor Layouts; 2024 - 36 - 03 REV A: Proposed Floor Layouts; 2024 - 36 - 04 REV A: Proposed Floor Layouts; 2024 - 36 - 05 REV A: Proposed Elevations; 2024 - 36 - 06 REV A: Proposed Block Plan; 2024 - 36 - 07 REV A: Proposed Location Plan; 2024 - 36 - 02 REV A: Existing Elevations
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those detailed in the application form and approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
